Name: Restaurant Dubbel
Review Text: Cozy, quite bar and restaurant in the Amsterdam museum district with a basic tasty menu. Reasonable prices in relation to the places around it. I ate here while in Amsterdam for a conference and wanted a quiet place to dine alone and this ‚Ä¶

Name: Restaurant Dubbel
Review Text: Perfect restaurant and bar. I habe been there with 8 month baby and employees were soo nice. Food was perfect. Place where you need to go and eat.

Name: Restaurant Dubbel
Review Text: Amazing burger with jalape√±os cheese and runny fried egg yummy and steak frites accompanied by crispy cut chips. If you looking for low key relaxed environment with yummy food. Friendly staff with good service.

Name: Restaurant Dubbel
Review Text: on  Saturday early night in December, we thought it would be no problem to find a place to eat. wrong (at least in places with high g+ reviews). luckily we found a place by the bar at Dubbel. relaxed atmosphere, friendly staff, and decent pub food (nothing to write home about, but nothing to complain about either)

Name: Restaurant Dubbel
Review Text: This was an incredible meal - and so close to the Rijksmuseum too! We got the sticky spareribs and the Wintervega - which was PLENTY to split between two people! Would recommend both. Plus two good beers was only 43 euros! And our waitress, Willemijn, was great.

Name: Restaurant Dubbel
Review Text: We were looking for a quiet, cozy place for dinner and this was the perfect spot. We chose to sit outside and as soon as it starting raining, the friendly staff rearranged our table for us. The burgers and steak tasted delicious and they ‚Ä¶

Name: Restaurant Dubbel
Review Text: V friendly staff (except the female) we were the only costumer there as they prepared the restaurant to open. He was v nice and helpful. Didnt order food as they wasnt ready. Just coffee and juice.

Name: Restaurant Dubbel
Review Text: Excellent cheese fondue! Steak was good too.

Name: Restaurant Dubbel
Review Text: We had an awesome experience at restaurant dubbel. Jesse was our server and was very attentive and accommodating the entire time. This was by far the best dining experience I had while in Amsterdam. It was an incredibly warm welcome to The Netherlands and I will definitely be back again to visit!

Name: Restaurant Dubbel
Review Text: I had the Jamaican chicken, but had the rice instead of fries originally offered with the meal. Nice presentation, but I was very disappointed with the meal. I got a small bowl of plain dry rice, and a very lightly seasoned whole (baby) ‚Ä¶

Name: Restaurant Dubbel
Review Text: Dubbel is a cozy, cute, and very friendly place. Not to mention, the food is delicious! I went there with two meat-eaters, and I am vegan.  I ordered a salad without cheese, and a few minutes later the chef came out and asked: "Are you ‚Ä¶

Name: Restaurant Dubbel
Review Text: Thoroughly enjoyed our experience at this restaurant. I had a flavourful steak which was prepared exactly as I requested and the fish special my wife had was light and tasty as well. We sat outside and got to watch the world pass by in between sips of some ‚ÄúTriples and Dubbels‚Äù beer. Just a great cozy night.

Name: Restaurant Dubbel
Review Text: We tried to get into the Castell which is right next door but we hadn't booked and the place isn't very big so we would have to wait. ‚Ä¶

Name: Restaurant Dubbel
Review Text: We just based on the Google info and visited this bar restaurant. Our experience was very nice. We order ribs and burger for two persons. The flies was very nice too. But I was full, I couldn't have more, otherwise I must finish all. All in all, it is nice...Worth to what you spent.

Name: Restaurant Dubbel
Review Text: A great place for a beer and a delicious vegan dinner. Came here with my mum and we were served quickly, despite there being lots of other guests around us. The staff were friendly and the drinks were great.

Name: Restaurant Dubbel
Review Text: Very nice place to be, great atmosphere and friendly but professional stuff. Great quality of food I had Satay Chicken, haven't tried other places but I can say it was really nice and satisfying, I would definitely come back and order it once again.

Name: Restaurant Dubbel
Review Text: We found this place based on a quick google search and we weren‚Äôt disappointed. Food was seriously amazing and the atmosphere was perfect. Best steak I‚Äôve ever had!

Name: Restaurant Dubbel
Review Text: I'm not a complaining customer, nor am I a demanding one, but this was so bad I had to post. I determine where I eat based on reviews when traveling and I read a lot of good reviews on this place. Well my families experience at 7PM on a ‚Ä¶

Name: Restaurant Dubbel
Review Text: Not only was the food here incredibly good (Grilled Swordfish), the cocktails (Negroni) and desserts (Pavlova) were as well. On top of that, this was the only restaurant I visited where I'd describe the wait staff as friendly. Plenty of ‚Ä¶

Name: Restaurant Dubbel
Review Text: Actually just went in there to grab a quick beer before a nearby concert, but luckily I stepped into the right place. Had a really great time, talking and joking with the bartenders. So I have to give my thanks for (at least the start of) a great last evening in Amsterdam! üòÑüòÅ

Name: Restaurant Dubbel
Review Text: Great friendly proactive service. Pleasant quiet spot by the canal. Great homemade fries, salad, and fresh veggies and bread to dip in tasty bubbling fondue!

Name: Restaurant Dubbel
Review Text: was very quiet the evening we went because of heavy rain, shame because the canal side of the place is not too bad set back from the noise. one of the staff serving was pretty grumpy and miserable, but the others were excellent. The ribs ‚Ä¶

Name: Restaurant Dubbel
Review Text: Nice place. The food is good and the staff are friendly. We four people ordered the dutch beefsteak, pork rib in BBQ sauce and lamb. The beefsteak tastes good and the  pepper sauce adds scores to it. The pork rib is in credible amount! It ‚Ä¶

Name: Restaurant Dubbel
Review Text: we were at this place for a bachelor don't with my friends. I had here one of the best fries and best ribs i have ever eaten! also the "Munich mule" ist very good. i can totally recommend this place!

Name: Restaurant Dubbel
Review Text:
Best beef pepper steak I've ever tasted!!
Great atmosphere with a really good vibe.
Beers were pretty tasty too! Value for your Euro!

Name: Restaurant Dubbel
Review Text:
My wife and I had an excellent meal in a very nice atmosphere.
Both the swordfish and the beef tenderloin were delicious meals. ‚Ä¶

Name: Restaurant Dubbel
Review Text: Great little spot. I had the spare ribs and fries and they were superb! The portion was generous, the staff polite and the prices reasonable. I highly recommend.

Name: Restaurant Dubbel
Review Text: Great food and service, burata was awesome

Name: Restaurant Dubbel
Review Text:
Very nice and cozy place to eat at. Reasonable prices and good food quality.
Very kind service!

Name: Restaurant Dubbel
Review Text: We went here for dinner on our last night in Amsterdam.  We started with the cheese fondue, which the everyone liked.  My wife and I had the Jamacican Marinated Pouisson, excellent.

Name: Restaurant Dubbel
Review Text: I always enjoy my time here. The food is not complicated, but just fine for a relaxing evening. The waiters are always friendly. I have been here many times and I love the atmosphere of this place.

Name: Restaurant Dubbel
Review Text: Really enjoyed our visit, lovely friendly staff, nice view of the canal on a hot day. The food was lovely, good portion sizes and yummy dessert.

Name: Restaurant Dubbel
Review Text: Super chill out place to eat very good fresh food. Great friendly young team made the experience special.

Name: Restaurant Dubbel
Review Text: Good food and pretty good prices. Not super traditional but you get to try Dutch beef and and almost every dish comes with fries and mayo.

Name: Restaurant Dubbel
Review Text: Great food.  It took a long time but that‚Äôs just Amsterdam.  I lost my credit card there.  They were very nice about destroying it so I didn‚Äôt have to get a new #.  I highly recommend.

Name: Restaurant Dubbel
Review Text: First meal in Amsterdam. Had the fish special with hollandaise, a side salad and frites. A-mazing! We arrived before they opened but they were accommodating to let us sit and drink while we waited. Friendly to English speakers.

Name: Restaurant Dubbel
Review Text: A very good restaurant, the food is good and affordable compared to other establishments. It has a nice touch to it. The music was good. The evening we had there was great.

Name: Restaurant Dubbel
Review Text: I ordered the spare ribs and were really good.  Sometimes ribs are overdosed of sauces but these ones had such a natural flavour, good choice!

Name: Restaurant Dubbel
Review Text: Great food for a good price,  accompanied by friendly and swift service as well as a good ambience.  I am definitely eating here again next time I visit Amsterdam.

Name: Restaurant Dubbel
Review Text:
Nice place, and staff were pleasant.

Name: Restaurant Dubbel
Review Text: Great place, food and service.

Name: Restaurant Dubbel
Review Text: One of my favorite restaurants in town. Good food for the right price.

Name: Restaurant Dubbel
